content.webTitle: Edinburgh festival podcast: The Guardian Live at the Gilded Balloon, with Tim Minchin

fields.headline: The Guardian Live at the Gilded Balloon, with Tim Minchin
fields.bodyText: Miles Jupp is joined live on stage at the Gilded Balloon by festival favourite Fred MacAulay, Australian rock legend Tim Minchin and the Guardian's top twitterer Leo Benedictus. We're also treated to some fantastic stand up from Maeve Higgins and a song from the mighty Minchin himself. The podcast is recorded in front of a live studio audience every day at noon - if you're in Edinburgh for the festival, we'd love to see you there. Tickets are free, and can be reserved by calling the Gilded Balloon box office on 0131-668 1633. More details on the venue's website. Warning: the show contains strong language.
